description: Non-material Amendment to Condition 3 (Drawings) of planning permission (Application ref. 2016/04585/VAR) dated 22 August 2017 (as amended by Non-Material Amendment Application (ref: 2023/01082/NMAT)), in relation to Plot G1.Proposed amendments include the following: - East Elevation Lower Ground Floor: Amendment to the door positions of the cycle store and secondary commercial entrance; replacement of two primary commercial entrance columns; changes in the facade treatment at the south end.- South and East Elevations: amendment to the location of the platform lift from the south-east corner with associated minor design amendments.- West Elevation: Introduction of a canopy at upper ground floor level; removal of two baguette-face double doors and replacement with fixed baguettes; additional glazing added to two doors; amendment to the south core windows to open outward; amendment to the plant screen at 8th floor level; amendment to the south core overrun; amendment to the Core A lift overrun.- North Elevation: Additional set ouf louvres at upper ground floor level.- Balcony Balustrade Materiality: Metal balcony balustrades proposed instead of glass.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
